verse: तद्यथा प्रियया स्त्रिया संपरिष्वक्तो न बाह्यं किंचन वेद नान्तरमेवमेवायं पुरुषः प्राज्ञेनात्मना संपरिष्वक्तो न बाह्यं किंचन वेद नान्तरं
meaning: just like a women embraces the beloved and does not experience anything inside and anything outside in a similar manner the supreme self embraces the self during deep sleep and the self does not experience anything inside and anything outside
